Sign + Return Writer Contract
Ask - mail to writer or pick up at MathSoc office
Remind writer about sketch
get feedback from student reviewers
get feedback from prof reviewers
submit cheque request for writer (unless the comic runs long)
revise sketch using feedback
Ask who is interested in drawing the sketch
let artists know who got the jobs
sign and return contract with artist
remind artist about first draft due
when artist finishes first draft - revisions if necessary
remind artist about final art
when artist finishes final art - revisions if necessary. make sure it does not contain copyrighted material.
submit cheque request for artist (3 parts + maybe reimbursement if they have it)
email finished comic to MEF (mefcom)
post on MathSoc Cartoons FB/Instagram
request to post on MathSoc social media
request to post in MathNEWS
request to post on MathSoc website
ask instructors for the course to distribute in class
get final feedback from student reviewers
show artists/writers where work is published
present feedback to artist
follow up to make sure artist and writer received cheque - this may take longer due to mailing delays :(
